mapper.insert: insert into tb_reserv(res_num, res_usedate, res_amount, res_state, mem_Id, sp_num, sp_name) values( tb_reserv_seq.nextval , to_date(#{resUseDate},'yyyy-MM') , ${res_Amount} , 1,'${mem_Id}' , ${sp_Num}, '${sp_Name}')
mapper.select: select count(sp_num) useSpace from tb_reserv where sp_num = ${sp_Num} and res_UseDate = to_date('${resUseDate}','yyyy-MM')
